mapper.select: SELECT store.id, store_name, category, store.section_id, address1, address2, zipcode, coordinates, tel_main, tel_sub, img1, img2, store_url, tag_keyword, tag_menu, tag_service, open, store.nickname, (SELECT toggle FROM favorite WHERE store_id=store.id AND section_id=#{sectionId} AND nickname=#{nickName}) toggle FROM store LEFT JOIN favorite ON store.id = favorite.store_id

SELECT store.id, store_name, category, store.section_id, address1, address2, zipcode, coordinates, tel_main, tel_sub, img1, img2, store_url, tag_keyword, tag_menu, tag_service, open, store.nickname, (SELECT toggle FROM favorite WHERE store_id=#{id} AND section_id=#{sectionId} AND nickname=#{nickName}) toggle FROM store LEFT JOIN favorite ON store.id = favorite.store_id WHERE store.id=#{id}

SELECT store.id, store_name, category, store.section_id, address1, address2, zipcode, coordinates, tel_main, tel_sub, img1, img2, store_url, tag_keyword, tag_menu, tag_service, open, store.nickname, (SELECT toggle FROM favorite WHERE store_id=store.id AND section_id=#{sectionId} AND nickname=#{nickName}) toggle FROM store LEFT JOIN favorite ON store.id = favorite.store_id WHERE
tag_keyword LIKE '%${keywords[index]}%'
OR
tag_menu LIKE '%${keywords[index]}%'
OR
tag_service LIKE '%${keywords[index]}%'
